content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> Hello!!

The conversational style of open-ended questioning encourages exploration and allows for deeper engagement with the droodle's elements, fostering personal connections and unique interpretations. This approach invites the human to draw from their experiences and creativity, potentially leading to more novel and imaginative captions.
